characters.name: DIO
characters.gameplan: Fragile when unfed, oppressive when fed. Land Vampiric Drain to stock Stolen Blood, convert it into Blood Focus to crush Energy costs, then use The World: Time Stop to lock the round and close with knife pressure or ROAD ROLLER DA!

innates.name: Predator's Regeneration
innates.text: The first time each turn this character gains Stolen Blood, heal 10 HP.

innates.name: Blood Is Power
innates.text: Whenever this character gains X Stolen Blood, gain X Blood Focus. Whenever this character spends X Stolen Blood, reduce Blood Focus Value by X. Once per game, when this character would be reduced to 0 HP: You may spend 3 Stolen Blood. If you do, set HP to 1 instead.

statusEffects.name: Stolen Blood
lines: Effect: A resource gained by feeding; used to extend Time Stop and empower finishers.

statusEffects.name: Blood Focus
lines: Effect: Reduce the Energy cost of this character's cards by Value (minimum 0). This stacks with Focus.

statusEffects.name: The World: Time Stop
lines: On Gain: Gain 2 Strength and +2 Strength Count. Gain 2 Haste and +2 Haste Count.
Effect: While this has 1+ Count, this character's Attack cards have Follow-Up.
When this expires: Gain 2 Strain and +4 Strain Count.

cards.name: Strike
effect: On Hit: If the target has Stun, gain 1 Stolen Blood.
If this character has The World: Time Stop: This card becomes Strike: Muda Barrage.

cards.name: Strike: Muda Barrage
effect: Once per use, if the target has Stun: Gain 2 Stolen Blood.

cards.name: Defend
effect: If this character has The World: Time Stop: This card becomes Defend: The World.

cards.name: Defend: The World
effect: After Use: Gain 1 Haste and +1 Haste Count.

cards.name: Vampiric Drain
effect: On Hit: Inflict 2 Weak and +2 Weak Count.
On Hit: If the target has Stun, gain 2 Stolen Blood.

cards.name: Throwing Knives
effect: This card's Multihit Count starts at 6.
If this character has The World: Time Stop: This card becomes Throwing Knives: Time Stop.

cards.name: Throwing Knives: Time Stop
effect: This card's Multihit Count starts at 10.
Once per use, if the target has Stun: Deal 10 bonus damage.

cards.name: The World: Time Stop
effect: Gain 1 The World: Time Stop and +2 The World: Time Stop Count.
You may spend X Stolen Blood (0-5). If you do, gain +X The World: Time Stop Count.
Until the end of this Combat Round, enemies cannot play cards. (Cards already played still resolve.)

cards.name: ROAD ROLLER DA!
effect: Can only be used if this character has The World: Time Stop.
You may spend X Stolen Blood (0-10). If you do, deal 6 times X bonus damage and inflict X Bleed.
After Use: Set this character's The World: Time Stop Count to 0.

characters.name: Goku
characters.gameplan: Chain low-cost attacks to build meter, use Kaioken to ramp Strength/Dexterity while managing the HP drain, then close with Spirit Bomb. Zenkai rewards playing at low HP, so plan a late spike.

innates.name: Zenkai Boost
innates.text: Each time this character reaches 25% HP, gain 1 Zenkai.

statusEffects.name: Kaioken
lines: Turn Start: Gain X Strength. Gain X Dexterity. Gain X-1 Haste. X equal to Potency.
Turn End: Reduce Count by 1. Reduce current HP by X times 10%.

statusEffects.name: Zenkai
lines: Effect: Increase Attack and Defense Power by 5% times Value.

cards.name: Meteor Combination
effect: If this character has Kaioken: This card becomes Kaio-ken Attack.

cards.name: Kaioken
effect: If this character has Kaioken: Gain 1 Kaioken and +1 Kaioken Count instead.

characters.name: Kurosaki Ichigo
characters.gameplan: Win fights the way Ichigo does here: clean sword pressure, Shunpo to steal tempo, build Reiatsu through exchanges, then cash out with Getsuga. Bankai is your end-it speed window, and Hollow Interference is a single risky surge that can save or throw the fight.

innates.name: Fighting Spirit
innates.text: The first time each turn this character takes damage to HP from an enemy Attack, gain 1 Reiatsu.

innates.name: Inner Hollow (Uncontrolled)
innates.text: The first time this character reaches 25% HP, gain 1 Hollow Interference. Gain 2 Reiatsu.

statusEffects.name: Reiatsu
lines: Effect: A resource gained through combat exchanges; spent to amplify Getsuga Tensho.

statusEffects.name: Bankai: Tensa Zangetsu
lines: Turn Start: Gain 2 Haste. Gain 1 Strength.
Effect: The first time each turn this character hits with an Attack, gain 1 Reiatsu.
When this expires: Gain 1 Strain and +3 Strain Count.

statusEffects.name: Hollow Interference
lines: Turn Start: Gain 2 Haste. Gain 2 Strength.
When this expires: Gain 1 Strain and +3 Strain Count.

cards.name: Strike
effect: Deal Power damage. On Hit: Gain 1 Reiatsu.
If this character has Hollow Interference: This card becomes Strike: White.
Otherwise, if this character has Bankai: Tensa Zangetsu: This card becomes Strike: Tensa Zangetsu.

cards.name: Strike: Tensa Zangetsu
effect: Deal Power damage. On Hit: Gain 1 Reiatsu.

cards.name: Strike: White
effect: Deal Power damage. On Hit: Gain 2 Reiatsu.
After Use: Gain 1 Vulnerable and +1 Vulnerable Count.

cards.name: Defend
effect: If this character has Bankai: Tensa Zangetsu: Gain 1 Haste and +1 Haste Count.

cards.name: Getsuga Tensho
effect: Deal Power damage. On Hit: Gain 1 Reiatsu.
You may spend X Reiatsu (0-3). If you do, deal 4 times X bonus damage.
If this character has Bankai: Tensa Zangetsu: This card becomes Getsuga Tensho: Tensa Zangetsu.

cards.name: Getsuga Tensho: Tensa Zangetsu
effect: Deal Power damage. On Hit: Gain 1 Reiatsu.
You may spend X Reiatsu (0-4). If you do, deal 5 times X bonus damage.

cards.name: Bankai: Tensa Zangetsu
effect: Gain 1 Bankai: Tensa Zangetsu and +4 Bankai: Tensa Zangetsu Count.
If this character has Bankai: Tensa Zangetsu, gain +2 Bankai: Tensa Zangetsu Count instead.

cards.name: Getsuga Tensho (Bankai Finisher)
effect: Can only be used if this character has Bankai: Tensa Zangetsu.
You may spend up to 6 Reiatsu. If you do, deal 4 times Reiatsu spent bonus damage.

characters.name: Leon S. Kennedy
characters.gameplan: Choose the right weapon with Switch Weapon, use Handgun for steady multihit poke and Riot Gun for follow-up burst into Suplex stuns, then dump excess Energy into Chicago Typewriter. Defend reloads your current weapon and keeps you safe; save Rocket Launcher for swing turns, and buy it with meter if you need the finisher.

innates.name: Special Agent Loadout
innates.text: This character starts with Equip: Handgun, 10 Handgun Ammo, 5 Shotgun Ammo, and 1 Rocket Launcher.

cards.name: Defend
effect: Gain Power Shield. Reload currently Equipped Weapon.

cards.name: Shoot: Handgun
effect: This card's Multihit Count starts at 3.
Set X to this card's remaining Multihit Count (before resolving this card). Spend Handgun Ammo up to X. Spend as many as possible.
Deal Power / X damage once per Ammo spent.
If this character has Equip: Riot Gun: This card becomes Shoot: Riot Gun.
If this character has Equip: Chicago Typewriter: This card becomes Shoot: Chicago Typewriter.

cards.name: Shoot: Riot Gun
effect: Spend 1 Shotgun Ammo to deal damage.

cards.name: Suplex
effect: On Follow-Up: Deal Power damage. Inflict 1 Stun instead.

cards.name: Switch Weapon
effect: If you choose the same weapon, Reload instead.

cards.name: Shoot: Rocket Launcher
effect: Spend 1 Rocket Launcher to deal damage.
If this character doesn't have Rocket Launcher, this Ultimate becomes Purchase Rocket Launcher.

characters.name: Light Yagami
characters.gameplan: Stack Stolen Information with retained intel, stall with tempo denial, then write a single name and spend Ultimate Meter to accelerate the countdown once full intel is secured.

innates.name: Meticulous Planner
innates.text: The first time each turn this character inflicts Stolen Information, draw 1.

statusEffects.name: Stolen Information
lines: Turn End: Reduce Stack by 1 while Stack is 5 or less.
Effect: Used by Kira's Death Note effects.

statusEffects.name: Death by Death Note
lines: Effect: This status cannot be removed. If Value reaches 0, this character's HP becomes 0.

cards.name: Strike
effect: Deal Power damage. On Hit: Inflict 1 Stolen Information.
On Hit: If the target has 3+ Stolen Information, inflict 1 Slow and +1 Slow Count.

cards.name: Blackmail
effect: If the target has 3+ Stolen Information, also inflict 1 Slow.

cards.name: Death Note: Write the Name
effect: Can only be used if the target has 6 Stolen Information.
Inflict 3 Death by Death Note. Then set the target's Stolen Information Value to 0.

cards.name: Death Note: Judgment
cards.cost: 30 Ultimate Meter + X times 10 Ultimate Meter
effect: Can only be used if the target has 6 Stolen Information or Death by Death Note.
Choose 1 enemy with 6 Stolen Information or Death by Death Note.
If the target has 6 Stolen Information, inflict 3 Death by Death Note and set its Stolen Information Value to 0.
Reduce the target's Death by Death Note Value by 1.
Reduce by 1 additional per 10 Ultimate Meter spent (max 2; cannot reduce below 1).

characters.name: Monkey D. Luffy
characters.gameplan: Lead with Gear Transformation: Gear 2nd for tempo and fast clashes, Gear 3rd for heavy hits. Plan around Deflate after Gear 3rd and use Jet Gatling as your high-pressure finisher when you are ahead.

statusEffects.name: Gear 2nd
lines: On Gain: Gain 1 Strength. Gain 1 Haste.

statusEffects.name: Gear 3rd
lines: On Gain: Gain 3 Strength. Gain 1 Slow.
When this expires: At your next Turn Start, gain Deflate.

statusEffects.name: Deflate
lines: Effect: Cannot play any card from this character.

cards.name: Gomu Gomu no Pistol
effect: If this character has Gear 2nd: This card becomes Gomu Gomu no Jet Pistol.
If this character has Gear 3rd: This card becomes Gomu Gomu no Gigant Pistol.

cards.name: Gomu Gomu no Bazooka
effect: If this character has Gear 2nd: This card becomes Gomu Gomu no Jet Bazooka.
If this character has Gear 3rd: This card becomes Gomu Gomu no Gigant Bazooka.

cards.name: Gear Transformation
effect: Cannot be used if this character has Gear 2nd or Gear 3rd.

cards.name: Gomu Gomu no Jet Gatling
effect: Can only be used if this character has Gear 2nd.
Deal Power / (X + 1) damage (X + 1) times. Inflict X Frail. Gain X Weak and +X Weak Count. Gain X Vulnerable and +X Vulnerable Count.
If this character has Gear 3rd: This Ultimate becomes Gomu Gomu no Gigant Rifle.

cards.name: Gomu Gomu no Gigant Rifle
effect: Can only be used if this character has Gear 3rd.
If this character has Gear 2nd: This Ultimate becomes Gomu Gomu no Jet Gatling.

characters.name: Naruto Uzumaki
characters.gameplan: Open with Shadow Clone Jutsu to flood your hand with disposable clone attacks and bank Shadow Clones as a resource. Keep 1 clone in reserve to turn Defend into an Evade. Convert the swarm into Naruto Uzumaki Barrage to win zones via Multihit pressure, then cash out with a clone-assisted Rasengan. When Nine-Tails' Resentment triggers, Kyuubi Chakra and One-Tail Cloak fuel Gamabunta follow-ups and unlock One-Tail Rasengan to close.

innates.name: Nine-Tails' Resentment
innates.text: The first time this character reaches 25% HP, gain 4 Kyuubi Chakra and +3 Kyuubi Chakra Count. Gain 4 One-Tail Cloak. Gain 2 Shadow Clones.

statusEffects.name: Shadow Clones
lines: Effect: Used to enhance Naruto's cards.

statusEffects.name: Kyuubi Chakra
lines: Turn Start: Gain X Strength. Gain X Haste.
Effect: The first time each turn this character plays Shadow Clone Jutsu, gain X Shadow Clones. X equals Potency.
Turn End: Reduce Count by 1. Reduce current HP by X times 5%. X equals Potency.

statusEffects.name: Summoned: Gamabunta
lines: Allies' Card Played: Once per turn, if Stack is 1+ and any ally plays an Attack that costs 2+ Energy and targets an enemy: Create 1 Gamabunta: Toad Smash in this character's hand.

statusEffects.name: One-Tail Cloak
lines: Effect: A marker used to unlock Naruto's low-HP finishers.

cards.name: Strike
effect: On Hit: If this character has Kyuubi Chakra, gain 1 Shadow Clones.

cards.name: Defend
effect: If this character has 1+ Shadow Clones: You may spend 1 Shadow Clones. If you do, this card gains Evade.

cards.name: Shadow Clone Jutsu
effect: Create 2 Shadow Clone: Strike in hand.

cards.name: Naruto Uzumaki Barrage
effect: On Hit: If X is 3, inflict 1 Stun.

cards.name: Rasengan
effect: If this character has 2+ Shadow Clones: This card becomes Rasengan: Clone Assist.

cards.name: Rasengan: Clone Assist
effect: On Hit: Inflict 2 Vulnerable and +2 Vulnerable Count.

cards.name: Summoning Jutsu: Gamabunta
effect: Deal Power damage. Inflict 1 Slow and +1 Slow Count.
If this character has One-Tail Cloak: This Ultimate becomes One-Tail Rasengan.

cards.name: One-Tail Rasengan
effect: Can only be used if this character has One-Tail Cloak.
On Hit: Inflict 2 Vulnerable and +2 Vulnerable Count. Inflict 1 Slow and +1 Slow Count.
After Use: Reduce Kyuubi Chakra Count by 2.

characters.name: Rover
characters.gameplan: Build Diminutive Sound with Strike/Aftertune, spend it on Resonating Slashes to stack Spectro Frazzle, and tax hands with Stagnate. Meter comes quickly, so lean on Echoing Orchestra for sustain.

innates.name: World in a Grain of Sand
innates.text: Each time any character inflicts Spectro Frazzle, inflict 1 additional Spectro Frazzle.

statusEffects.name: Diminutive Sound
lines: Effect: Used to enhance some cards.

cards.name: Strike
effect: Deal Power damage. Gain 1 Diminutive Sound. Gain 1 Ultimate Meter.

cards.name: Defend
effect: Gain Power Shield. Gain 1 Ultimate Meter.

cards.name: Resonating Slashes
effect: Deal Power / 2 damage 2 times. On Hit: Spend 1 Diminutive Sound to inflict 2 Spectro Frazzle.

cards.name: Aftertune
effect: Deal Power damage. Gain 1 Diminutive Sound.

cards.name: Echoing Orchestra
effect: Deal Power damage. Heal for Power / 2 HP. On Hit: Inflict 6 Spectro Frazzle.

characters.name: Saitama
characters.gameplan: Spend early turns on Bored cards to build State, pivot into Normal Punches to push toward Serious, and use your fast finishers plus stuns to swing rounds once the power spikes come online.

innates.name: Limitless Potential
innates.text: This character starts with State at 0 and State: Bored. When State reaches 10, remove State: Bored and gain State: Normal. When State reaches 30, remove State: Normal and gain State: Serious.

statusEffects.name: State
lines: Effect: Used to unlock Saitama's state thresholds and scale state bonuses.

statusEffects.name: State: Normal
lines: Turn Start: Gain X Strength. Gain X Dexterity. Gain X Haste. X equals State Value / 10 (round down).

statusEffects.name: State: Serious
lines: Turn Start: Gain X Strength. Gain X Dexterity. Gain X Fortified. Gain X Haste. X equals State Value / 10 (round down).

cards.name: Bored
effect: If this character has State: Normal or State: Serious, this card becomes Strike.

cards.name: Bored
effect: If this character has State: Normal or State: Serious, this card becomes Defend.

cards.name: Bored
effect: If this character has State: Normal or State: Serious, this card becomes Normal Punch.

cards.name: Normal Punch
effect: If this character has State: Serious, this card becomes Serious Punch.

cards.name: Bored
effect: If this character has State: Normal or State: Serious, this card becomes Normal Punch.

cards.name: Normal Punch
effect: If this character has State: Serious, this card becomes Serious Headbutt.

cards.name: Serious Headbutt
effect: Deal Power damage. Inflict 1 Stun. Gain 1 State.

cards.name: Bored
effect: If this character has State: Normal or State: Serious, this card becomes Consecutive Normal Punch.

cards.name: Consecutive Normal Punch
effect: Deal Power / (X + 1) damage (X + 1) times. Gain X State.
If this character has State: Serious, this card becomes Serious Consecutive Side Hops.

cards.name: Serious Consecutive Side Hops
effect: Deal Power / 2 damage. Gain Power / 2 Shield. Gain 1 State.
